edu.rit.pjmr

Class ReducerConfig<K,V extends Vbl>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pjmr.ReducerConfig<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key data type.
    V - Value data type; must implement interface Vbl.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class ReducerConfig<K,V extends Vbl>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Streamable
    Class ReducerConfig contains specifications for configuring a Reducer in a reducer task.

    • Method Detail

      • needsGpu

        public ReducerConfig<K,V> needsGpu()
        Specify that this reducer needs a GPU. If not specified, the default is that the reducer does not need a GPU.
        Returns:
        This reducer config object.

      • reducer

        public <T extends Reducer<K,V>> ReducerConfig<K,V> reducer(java.lang.Class<T> reducerClass,
                                                  java.lang.String... args)
        Add the given Reducer to this reducer's reducer task. For further information, see ReducerTaskConfig.reducer().
        Parameters:
        reducerClass - Reducer class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the reducer.
        Returns:
        Reducer config object for reducerClass.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if reducerClass is null.

      • reducer

        public <T extends Reducer<K,V>> ReducerConfig<K,V> reducer(int copies,
                                                  java.lang.Class<T> reducerClass,
                                                  java.lang.String... args)
        Add the given number of copies of the given Reducer to this reducer's reducer task. For further information, see ReducerTaskConfig.reducer().
        Parameters:
        copies - Number of copies to add (≥ 1).
        reducerClass - Reducer class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the reducers.
        Returns:
        Reducer config object for reducerClass.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if copies < 1.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if reducerClass is null.
